genresAdvancedInfo.name: raga rock
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Raga rock is a fusion genre that combines elements of Indian classical music with rock music. It typically features the use of traditional Indian instruments such as the sitar and tabla, along with electric guitars and drums. The genre gained popularity in the 1960s and 70s with bands like The Beatles and The Rolling Stones incorporating Indian influences into their music.
